title: Feedback on type for band, Shrewdness of Apes, would be much appreciated.
content:
I started by writing the name with a paint pen, scanning it in, and turning it into a vector. My goal is to create something that is upbeat, fresh, and doesn't look homemade. Feel free to critique it in a reverse compliment sandwich.

Here is a link to the band for comparison. [http://mableyandgreek.bandcamp.com/#zplays](http://web.archive.org/web/20150424023321/http:/mableyandgreek.bandcamp.com/#zplays "http://mableyandgreek.bandcamp.com/#zplays")

Thanks!  
Jamie
